segment.source: You already have a company email account.
segment.target: You already have a company email account.

segment.source: To continue to connect to your company email, you’ll need to take the following steps to enable your IT admin to properly set up and manage your account:
segment.target: To continue to connect to your company email, you’ll need to take the following steps to enable your IT admin to properly set up and manage your account:

segment.source: In Settings on your device, remove the connection you previously set up to your company email.
segment.target: In Settings on your device, remove the connection you previously set up to your company email.

segment.source: For example, on an iOS device, tap Settings > Mail, Contacts, Calendar.
segment.target: For example, on an iOS device, tap Settings > Mail, Contacts, Calendar.

segment.source: Select your work email account, and then click Delete.
segment.target: Select your work email account, and then click Delete.

segment.source: Open the company portal app on your device and tap Check Compliance.
segment.target: Open the company portal app on your device and tap Check Compliance.

segment.source: Wait a short time for new email settings to be applied to your device automatically.
segment.target: Wait a short time for new email settings to be applied to your device automatically.

segment.source: If new email settings do not appear after a while, contact your IT admin.
segment.target: If new email settings do not appear after a while, contact your IT admin.
